messages.title: A RECORD OF ACTION IN TRURO & FALMOUTH
messages.content: Sarah has worked hard in this new constituency, getting to grips with the issues facing people living here. She has been listening, understanding and taking action on issues to improve our community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sarah has championed local homes for local people, many initiatives are well underway to provide affordable and key worker accommodation close to campuses.

Vital for national security, local jobs and lower energy bills. Sarah has supported the bid to construct an offshore wind project off Cornish coast and ensured the continuation of funding for wave hub. Key for pensioners and people living on low incomes.

Sarah is keen to help youngsters to reach their potential and is involved in schemes, networks, and a youth sailing competition. She set up the Tall Ships Challenge 100, an international youth race in 2009.

housing.content: LOCAL HOMES FOR LOCAL PEOPLE - Sarah has championed local homes for local people, many initiatives are well underway to provide affordable and key worker accommodation close to campuses.

images.caption: Sarah with various individuals, supporting local businesses, armed forces, sustainable energy, and youth opportunities.
